title: Ticket #6691: Update annex scripts to take advantage of faster tagging.
description:
Spot Fleet instances should now be born tagged with the identity of the Spot Fleet that spawned them. We should change the annex scripts to take advantage:

  1. remove the time-out (but not the retry) for obtaining the tag (fail fast if we're going to)
  2. update the script(/code?) to use the tag to get the annex ID (not parse the client token). (See if this applies to non-Spot-Fleet instances as well -- do we or can we specify a tag on instance request with which the instance is born?)
creator: tlmiller
